name: Siege!
description:
The princess has been whisked away in the arms of a dragon, and taken away to live in the Mage's Tower... and she doesn't want to leave! As all of the King's men march towards your doorstep, can you defend your home, and your love? 

Siege is a  tower defense game, with shoot-em-up mechanics and light RPG elements.

Instructions

Survive a series of waves by enemy soldiers to win. Swap between 3 units and attack! In between waves, bolster yourself by purchasing stat upgrades, skills, and abilities. 

Knights will try and climb the tower and steal the Princess, if they take her offscreen, you lose!

Archers will fire arrows that temporarily stun you!

Giants will try and knock your tower down lower! 

Controls

Select Character - Left-click on an on-screen sprite, or use the scroll-wheel.

Activate Selected Ability- Left-click on screen where you wish to activate your ability. 

Select Ability - Click on the desired Ability tab at the top of the screen, or use the number keys.

 Change auto-attack mode- Use the buttons in the upper right hand corner to swap between enemy-mode and target-mode, or use left ctrl to quickly toggle. Unselected units will continue to use their last selected ability. 

Place target while in target-mode - Right-click.
